about.title: About Wadi Rum Heritage
about.paragraph1: Wadi Rum Heritage offers authentic desert experiences led by local Bedouin guides who have lived in this magnificent landscape for generations. Our team is passionate about sharing the natural beauty, rich culture, and ancient history of Wadi Rum with visitors from around the world.
about.paragraph2: We pride ourselves on sustainable tourism practices that respect the delicate desert ecosystem while providing unforgettable adventures for our guests. From thrilling jeep tours to peaceful nights under the stars, we create memories that will last a lifetime.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Wadi Rum Heritage
whyChoose.subtitle: Experience the difference with our authentic Bedouin hospitality and expert local knowledge

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Our guides are local Bedouins with deep knowledge of Wadi Rum's terrain, history, and culture, ensuring an authentic experience.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: We offer customizable tour durations and start times to fit your travel plans perfectly.

smallGroups.title: Small Group Sizes
smallGroups.description: We keep our groups small to ensure personalized attention and a more intimate desert experience.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our team is available around the clock to assist with any questions or special requests.

equipment.title: Quality Equipment
equipment.description: We provide high-quality camping gear, vehicles, and safety equipment for a comfortable adventure.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Your safety is our priority, with comprehensive safety protocols and experienced guides.

outdoorAdventures.title: Discover Wadi Rum with Wadi Rum Heritage Outdoor Adventures
outdoorAdventures.description: Immerse yourself in a spectacular outdoor experience with our authentic bivouac camping, exhilarating jeep tours, and awe-inspiring climbing adventures. Enjoy the serenity of nature while creating unforgettable memories in one of the world's most captivating desert landscapes.

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read testimonials from travelers who have experienced the magic of Wadi Rum with us

testimonial1.quote: Our jeep tour with Wadi Rum Heritage was the highlight of our Jordan trip. The guides were knowledgeable and friendly, and the desert landscapes were breathtaking.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: Spending the night in the desert camp was magical. The traditional food was delicious, and sleeping under the stars was an unforgettable experience.
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

testimonial3.quote: The hiking tour was perfectly organized. Our guide knew all the best spots and shared fascinating stories about Bedouin culture and history.
testimonial3.author: Elena Kowalski

cta.title: Ready for Your Desert Adventure?

hero.title: Jeep Tours in Wadi Rum
hero.subtitle: Explore the vast desert landscapes and iconic rock formations with our experienced Bedouin guides

intro.title: Experience the Desert by Jeep
intro.paragraph1: Our jeep tours offer the perfect way to explore the vast and stunning landscapes of Wadi Rum. Travel across the desert in 4x4 vehicles driven by experienced Bedouin guides who know every corner of this magnificent wilderness.
intro.paragraph2: Visit iconic sites including ancient rock inscriptions, natural rock bridges, towering cliffs, and hidden canyons. Our guides will share their knowledge of Bedouin culture, desert wildlife, and the rich history of this UNESCO World Heritage site.
intro.paragraph3: Whether you choose a few hours or a full-day tour with overnight camping, our jeep adventures provide unforgettable memories of Jordan's most spectacular desert landscape.

pricing.title: Jeep Tour Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect tour package based on your group size

info.title: Tour Information
info.point1: All prices are per person and include guide, transportation, meals, and camping equipment.
info.point2: Tours start and end at Wadi Rum Village or can be arranged from your accommodation.
info.point3: Custom itineraries and shorter tours are available upon request.
info.point4: Booking in advance is recommended, especially during peak season.

experience.title: What You'll Experience
experience.subtitle: Highlights of our Wadi Rum jeep tours

rockBridges.title: Natural Rock Bridges
rockBridges.description: Marvel at the stunning natural rock bridges formed over thousands of years, including the famous Um Fruth Rock Bridge.

sandDunes.title: Red Sand Dunes
sandDunes.description: Climb the magnificent red sand dunes for panoramic views of the desert landscape and watch the sand change colors with the shifting sunlight.

petroglyphs.title: Ancient Petroglyphs
petroglyphs.description: Discover ancient rock inscriptions and petroglyphs that tell the story of early civilizations and Bedouin history in the region.

cta.title: Ready to Book Your Jeep Tour?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to reserve your spot and experience the magic of Wadi Rum

hero.title: Desert Camping in Wadi Rum
hero.subtitle: Experience the magic of sleeping under the stars in traditional Bedouin camps

intro.title: Authentic Desert Camping
intro.paragraph1: Experience the true magic of Wadi Rum with our authentic Bedouin camping experiences. Spend the night under a canopy of stars in the heart of the desert, surrounded by towering sandstone mountains and vast open spaces.
intro.paragraph2: Our camps offer a perfect blend of traditional Bedouin hospitality and comfort. Enjoy delicious meals cooked in the traditional desert way, listen to Bedouin stories around the campfire, and wake up to a spectacular desert sunrise.
intro.paragraph3: Choose between our traditional Bedouin tent camp or our desert camping experience for an unforgettable night in Wadi Rum.

hero.title: Hike Wadi Rum
hero.subtitle: Explore the magnificent desert landscape on foot with our guided hiking tours

hero.title: Rock Climbing in Wadi Rum
hero.subtitle: Challenge yourself on the magnificent sandstone formations with our expert climbing guides

hero.title: Scrambling in Wadi Rum
hero.subtitle: Explore the unique geological features with exciting scrambling experiences

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.subtitle: Meet our team of experienced Bedouin guides who will make your Wadi Rum experience unforgettable

intro.paragraph1: Wadi Rum Heritage was founded by local Bedouins who have lived in this magnificent desert landscape for generations. Our team grew up exploring the vast canyons, climbing the sandstone mountains, and learning the ancient ways of desert life from our elders.
intro.paragraph2: What began as a small family operation has grown into a respected tour company, but we've never lost our connection to our roots. We remain committed to sharing the authentic culture, traditions, and natural beauty of Wadi Rum with visitors from around the world.
intro.paragraph3: Our deep knowledge of the desert, passed down through generations, allows us to offer unique experiences that go beyond typical tourism. When you travel with Wadi Rum Heritage, you're not just a tourist – you're our honored guest, experiencing our homeland through the eyes of those who know and love it best.

guides.title: Meet Our Guides
guides.subtitle: Our experienced Bedouin guides are passionate about sharing their heritage and knowledge

salem.name: Salem
salem.description: Salem is the proud owner of the camp and a passionate advocate for Bedouin traditions. He has dedicated his life to sharing the magic of Wadi Rum with visitors from around the world, ensuring an authentic and unforgettable experience for every guest.
salem.specialties: Specialties: Hospitality, cultural heritage, camp management

omar.name: Omar
omar.description: Omar is a seasoned desert guide with a deep passion for sharing the beauty and history of Wadi Rum. He has spent his life exploring the vast landscapes and is known for his engaging storytelling and warm hospitality.
omar.specialties: Specialties: Cultural tours, desert navigation, Bedouin traditions

alibaba.name: Ali-Alibaba
alibaba.description: Ali-Alibaba is a charismatic guide with years of experience leading adventure seekers through the wonders of Wadi Rum. His knowledge of desert wildlife and hidden gems makes every tour unique and unforgettable.
alibaba.specialties: Specialties: Wildlife tracking, desert survival, photography

abdullah.name: Abdulah (Ali's Son)
abdullah.description: Following in his father's footsteps, Abdulah has inherited a love for the desert and a wealth of traditional knowledge. He enjoys showing visitors the secrets of Wadi Rum while ensuring they have an authentic Bedouin experience.
abdullah.specialties: Specialties: Family tours, cultural heritage, camel riding

murad.name: Murad
murad.description: Murad is an expert in desert navigation and geology, making him the perfect guide for those eager to learn about the ancient landscapes of Wadi Rum. His friendly and knowledgeable approach ensures a fun and informative journey.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: What drives us and shapes the experiences we create

authentic.title: Authentic Experiences
authentic.description: We are committed to providing genuine Bedouin experiences that reflect our culture, traditions, and way of life. We believe in sharing the real Wadi Rum, not a commercialized version.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: We employ local Bedouins and support the local community. By choosing Wadi Rum Heritage, you're directly contributing to the sustainable development of our region.

environmental.title: Environmental Respect
environmental.description: We practice responsible tourism that respects and preserves the delicate desert ecosystem. We follow leave-no-trace principles and educate our guests about desert conservation.

cta.title: Experience Wadi Rum with Us
cta.subtitle: Join us for an authentic desert adventure guided by local Bedouins who are passionate about sharing their heritage
